exceptions.tactic: intros P Hmgv_deghost net Hmgv_refined net_refined.

exceptions.exn: The reference Hmgv_deghost was not found in the current environment.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params

Goal:
forall P : network -> Prop, (forall net : network, msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P (mgv_deghost net)) -> forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net

Premises:
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
Inductive msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := MRRIR_init : msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | MRRIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net' | MRRIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (ps' : list packet) (st' : name -> data
Inductive refined_raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := RRIR_init : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | RRIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net' | RRIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (gd : electionsData) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (ps' : list packet) (st' : name -> data), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handle
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Notation mgv_deghost := GhostSimulations.mgv_deghost
Build_raft_msg_refinement_interface : (forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot P -> msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net) ->...-> raft_msg_refinement_interface
Record raft_msg_refinement_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_raft_msg_refinement_interface { msg_refined_raft_net_invariant : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P ->...-> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable (mgv_deghost net) } Arguments raft_msg_refinement_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_raft_msg_refinement_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
msg_lower_prop : forall P : network -> Prop, (forall net : network, msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P (mgv_deghost net)) -> forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net where ?orig_base_params : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params |- BaseParams] ?one_node_params : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params |- OneNodeParams ?orig_base_params] ?raft_params : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params |- RaftParams ?orig_base_params] ?raft_msg_refinement_interface : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params |- raft_msg_refinement_interface]

Record raft_refinement_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_raft_refinement_interface { refined_raft_net_invariant : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset P ->...-> raft_intermediate_reachable (deghost net) } Arguments raft_refinement_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_raft_refinement_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
